RulesList.name: Advanced Tactics
RulesList.text: Once per activation, before attacking, pick 2 friendly units within 12" of this model, which may move by up to 3" each.

RulesList.name: Medical Training
RulesList.text: This model and its unit get the Regeneration rule.

RulesList.name: Repair
RulesList.text: Once per activation, if within 2" of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair D3 wounds from the target.

RulesList.name: Shield Wall
RulesList.text: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.

RulesList.name: Veteran Infantry
RulesList.text: This model gets +1 to hit rolls in melee and shooting.

RulesList.name: War Chant
RulesList.text: The hero and its unit get +1 attack in melee when charging.

RulesList.name: Blurred Sight (4+)
RulesList.text: Target 2 enemy units within 12" get -1 to hit next time they shoot.

RulesList.name: Psychic Terror (4+)
RulesList.text: Target enemy unit within 6" takes 3 hits with AP(2).

RulesList.name: Cerebral Trauma (5+)
RulesList.text: Target enemy model within 12" takes 2 hits with AP(4).

RulesList.name: Cursed Ground (5+)
RulesList.text: Target 2 enemy units within 6" get -2" next time they Advance, or -4" next time they Charge/Rush.

RulesList.name: Lightning Fog (6+)
RulesList.text: Target 2 enemy units within 6" take 8 hits each

RulesList.name: Time Passage (6+)
RulesList.text: Target friendly unit within 12" gets Impact(1) next time it charges
